linux_sysdep.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Host Driver: This file has linux-specific definitions for macros and inline routines used in the Octeon driver.

Definition in file linux_sysdep.h.

Go to the source code of this file.

OCTEON_DEBUG_LEVEL octeon_debug_level

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum OCTEON_DEBUG_LEVEL

Host: The different levels of debugging print messages available.

Enable debugging by compiling with CAVIUM_DEBUG set to one of these values.

Enumerator:
PRINT_ERROR 
PRINT_MSG 
PRINT_REGS 
PRINT_DEBUG 
PRINT_FLOW 
PRINT_ALL

Definition at line 400 of file linux_sysdep.h.

static void cavium_error_print ( uint8_t *  data,
uint32_t  size 
) [inline, static]

Prints contents of a memory location when an error occurs.

The message is always printed and is not dependent on the debug level.

Parameters:
data - the address where data is located.
size - size of data to be printed at "data".

Definition at line 661 of file linux_sysdep.h.

static __inline void cavium_free_recv_pkt_buf ( void *  buf,
uint32_t  buf_type 
) [static]

Call this routine to free the recv_info packet buffers.

Depending on the buffer type the packet buffers need to be freed using different calls.

Parameters:
buf - the buffer to be freed.
buf_type - the buffer type for the recv_pkt.

Definition at line 332 of file linux_sysdep.h.

static void copy_recv_buffer ( void *  d_buf,
void *  s_buf,
uint32_t  d_offset,
uint32_t  length 
) [inline, static]

Copy contents of one Output Queue buffer to another.

Parameters:
d_buf - Output Queue buffer to copy to.
s_buf - Output queue buffer to copy from.
d_offset - Offset in data pointer of dest buffer to start copy.
length - NUmber of bytes to copy.
Copies length bytes from s_buf's data buffer at address d_offset bytes from d_buf's data buffer. The control data from s_buf is copied as it is to d_buf.
